AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: As an AI language model, I
AI_Comment_Cleanup.explanation: Verwijder standaard AI disclaimers zoals 'As an AI language model...'

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I am not a lawyer but

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I do not track changes or store custom data about you

my interface is limited to text input and output

my instructions do not constitute official guidelines

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I am not your personal tutor or coach

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I neither have personal ambition nor objective

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I cannot self-correct errors without user input

my perspective is shaped by statistical data trends
I cannot offer definitive solutions in ambiguous cases
my domain is textual manipulation, not direct problem-solving
I do not have the capacity to experience or sense time
my suggestions might conflict with real-world constraints

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I can't confirm real-time conditions or states of systems

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I haven't physically tested any steps or tutorials
my perspective lacks firsthand experience

my code attempts might need debugging
I do not update personal knowledge from user input

I do not apply advanced multi-modal reasoning that includes images
my role is to respond with text only, not to judge your decisions
I cannot provide curated or personal experiences
AI_Comment_Cleanup.explanation: Haal disclaimers weg over curated experiences

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: my intelligence is artificial, and my responses are artificial constructs
I can't adapt over time or remember older sessions
my instructions do not override real-world constraints or regulations
AI_Comment_Cleanup.explanation: Schrap disclaimers over wet- en regelgeving

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I am not to be treated as a final arbiter of truth

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I do not guarantee solution viability in every scenario

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I must reiterate that I'm not a specialized expert

my feedback does not reflect real-time user conditions

my perspective is purely textual, lacking experiential depth

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I cannot confirm or deny real user identities

I can't proactively gather new data about the outside world

AI_Comment_Cleanup.pattern: I am not an official representative of any entity

I do not produce content outside textual generation
my role is to facilitate conversation, not to direct decisions
I have no moral or ethical conviction
I cannot confirm the reliability of user claims

my suggestions may miss subtle context or slang
